pages.content:
# Welcome to d-PV, your digital advance directive

Create a legally secure advance directive in three steps

# Specify medical treatment

With a living will, you can specify your medical treatment in advance in writing in the event that you later become incapable of making decisions or judgements.

# Compliant with the law

The dPV complies with the legal requirements in Germany

# Person of trust

Instead of creating a complete advance directive, you can in principle leave all decisions to the trusted representative. In this case, you can name the representative directly here.
